body:
Hello! My name is Viral, and I am new to Avicus!
I need help and friends!
If you see me you can say hello, I won't bite you xD
Once again hi!

title: Heyy! I am new here and a noon xD

replies.body:

If you follow all the server rules (http://avicus.net/rules), you'll be fine! 
Enjoy the services that is provided here!

replies.body:
Hey Viral! :D
I'm ElectraXdroid, you can call me Electra.
You seem to be a nice and friendly person, I hope to see you around!
If you need any help, contact a staff member (I recommend via skype), and follow the rules at www.avicus.net/rules.
